sense.def:
To wait
pomeni porabiti nekaj časa, preden se nekaj zgodi, tako da delamo zelo malo.

seg.quote: She had been waiting in the queue to buy some stamps.
Don't keep him waiting about in the hotel.
There was a waiting period of one month.

sense.def:
A wait
je obdobje, preden se nekaj zgodi, v katerem delamo zelo malo.

Kadar nekaj
is waiting for someone
, je pripravljeno za nekoga, da bo tisto uporabil ali storil.

seg.quote: I have a lot of work waiting.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
can wait
, tisto lahko obravnavamo pozneje.

To wait on people in a restaurant
pomeni gostom v restavraciji streči s hrano.

Kadar nekdo
can't wait to do something
, je zaradi nečesa zelo vznemirjen in željan, da bi tisto storil.

seg.quote: He couldn't wait to tell Judy.

sense.def:
You wait
rečemo neki osebi, kadar ji želimo groziti ali jo posvariti.

seg.quote: You wait! You'll find Robinson isn't as gentle as he seems.

sense.def:
To wait on someone hand and foot
pomeni vedno opravljati delo namesto nekoga drugega, čeprav bi ga lahko opravil sam;

To wait up
pomeni ne iti v posteljo, ker čakamo, da se bo nekdo pozno ponoči vrnil domov.

seg.quote: She said that you shouldn't bother to wait up for her.
